alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 10:53AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Collier County through 1145 AM EDT... At 1053 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Marco Island Airport, or near Marco Island, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Naples, Golden Gate Estates, Naples Park, Belle Meade, Marco Island Airport, Orangetree, Naples Manor, Golden Gate, East Naples, Lely Resort, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Vineyards, Royal Palm Hammock, North Naples, Pelican Bay, Corkscrew Swamp Sanctuary, Lely, Rookery Bay Aquatic Preserve, Quail Creek Estate and Fiddlers Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
